article_title: Why IRS Form 1099 Is So Dangerous To Your Tax Bill

article_metadata.author: Robert W. Wood

og.description: Most tax audits are about information matching, making IRS Form 1099 the most important tax form of all. Failing to report one is asking for an audit.
